description:
It looks like I'm inside the main entryway of the mansion. There seems to be a sword on the ground. 
I see a hallway to my left and a staircase ahead of me. 
Should I go to the hallway(NW) or to the stairs(NE)?

Got it. I'm in this narrow hallway. I see 4 rooms. Looks like there is a boys bedroom(NW) and bathroom(NE)
and a girl's bedroom(SW) and bathroom(SE)... where to first?,
I could always go back.
Looks like I'm in a girl's bedroom. Looks pretty normal here...let's go back to the hallway(NE).
Looks like I'm in a boy's bedroom. This room seems to be very messy...Wait! I see a bow in the corner of the room.
Looks like I'm in a boys bathroom. Nothing here... let's go back to the hallway(SW)
Looks like I'm in the girls bathroom. I open a cabinet underneath the sink and find a key! Should I take it...or go to the hallway(NW)
I'm at the stairs. Should I go upstairs (N) or downstairs (S).
*Cough* I'm in the attic. Huge attic, should I keep going east or go back?
I can't seem to find anything here. There's just cobwebs and dust.
I'm downstairs, which seems to be a basement. Should I keep moving (S)?
I see a couple of boxes over here...I thought I saw another monster. I see something in the corner of the room (S)
I see something over here. Looks like its a hidden trapdoor! I pulled it open. Seems to lead to another downstairs cellar. Let's keep going? (S)
I'm in a cellar. It's a little tight down here, but I can keep climbing down (S).
This looks like a dungeon down here. I turn around to see piles of sand (it could be human ashes!) but I keep searching around in the dimly lit room. Let's keep looking (S)
I can feel the border of the left wall. There seems to be some old bookshelves. I pull out a book to see 'Ghost stories to Tell in the Dark...How fun...WAIT, I SEE A DOOR! (NW)
I see a door. It seems to be locked. There's a keyhole here though. Wait, 'open' the door with the key!
You escaped the haunted mansion alive! Congrats and don't come back!
